name: Core Laboratories N.V.
description: Core Laboratories N.V. is a leading provider of proprietary and patented reservoir description and production enhancement services to the oil and gas industry. Founded in 1936, the company operates globally, providing services and products that significantly enhance the productivity and profitability of oil and gas reservoirs. Core Laboratories specializes in reservoir optimization, offering a range of services including reservoir fluid analysis, rock mechanics, and enhanced oil recovery technologies. With a strong emphasis on innovation, Core Laboratories invests heavily in research and development to deliver cutting-edge solutions that meet the evolving needs of its clients. The company is committed to sustainability and operates with a focus on environmental stewardship, ensuring that its practices minimize any adverse impacts on the environment. Core Laboratories serves a diverse clientele that includes major and independent oil and gas companies, government agencies, and academic institutions. By leveraging its extensive knowledge and expertise, the company strives to provide the highest quality data and insights to help clients make informed decisions regarding their reservoir management strategies.

key_executives.name: Philip L. W. T. de Jong

seo.meta_title: Core Laboratories N.V. | Reservoir Optimization and Production Enhancement
seo.meta_description: Explore Core Laboratories N.V., a leader in reservoir description and production enhancement services for the oil and gas industry. Learn about our innovative solutions and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does Core Laboratories specialize in?
faq.answer: Core Laboratories specializes in reservoir description and production enhancement services for the oil and gas industry.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Core Laboratories?
faq.answer: David Demers is the CEO of Core Laboratories N.V.

faq.question: Where is Core Laboratories headquartered?
faq.answer: Core Laboratories is headquartered in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

faq.question: What are Core Laboratories' main products?
faq.answer: Core Laboratories' main products include core analysis, fluid analysis, and enhanced oil recovery services.
